quotes.quote: When you allow yourself to be unpredictable, you step from the known into the unknown, where anything is possible.
The more unpredictable the world is the more we rely on predictions.
Life is no different than the weather. Not only is it unpredictable, but it shows us a new perspective of the world every day.
The truth is most women are weak, be they mortal or immortal. But when they are strong, they are absolutely unpredictable.
Life is a desert of shifting sand dunes. Unpredictable. Erratic. Harmony changes into dissonance, the immediate outlives the profound, esoteric becomes cliched. And vice versa.
Happiness came in moments of unpredictable loveliness.
The very nature of interactions is bound to make it unpredictable.
The course of life is unpredictable, no one can write his autobiography in advance.
Others follow patterns; we alone are unpredictable.
Love is as irrational as hate and just as unpredictable.
When you can become completely impassive in play, then you become fluid and completely unpredictable. No one knows, including yourself, what you will do next. You couldn't even explain it.
Nothing is written in stone, as a career is an unpredictable journey.
At odd and unpredictable times, we cling in fright to the past.
The idea that the future is unpredictable is undermined every day by the ease with which the past is explained.
How complicated and unpredictable the machinery of life really is.

The world is so unpredictable. Things happen suddenly, unexpectedly. We want to feel we are in control of our own existence. In some ways we are, in some ways we're not. We are ruled by the forces of chance and coincidence.
Children are unpredictable. You never know what inconsistency they are going to catch you in next.
Be unpredictable, be real, be interesting. Tell a good story.
At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
Life is unpredictable when you get non-standard behavior patterns.
Life is unpredictable and you need to live every day to the fullest.
